heisig_chinese_memo: The ant is an insect of righteousness, putting the group before its individual concerns.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the insect (虫) with honour (義) is an ant
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Leave a bouquet outside for too long and insects will be all over it.  If it falls on the ground the ants just might make use of it too!
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " worm " and " righteousness ", the original meaning is ant. "Zhuangzi·Xu Wugui": "Lamb does not adore ants, but ants admire mutton, and mutton is mutton."

" Ant " can mean bubbles floating on the surface of the wine. Wei Cao Zhi of the Three Kingdoms "Jieyou Fu": "Floating and sinking ants are in the golden lizard, and the walking is a good enemy."

" Ant " also means black, that is, red and black, with red in black. "Shu‧Gu Ming": "Qing Shibangjun, Ma Mian ant clothes, enter the throne." Kong Chuan: "Ants, clothes names, colors." Kong Yingdashu: "Ants, worms. This insect is black , I know that the clothes of an ant are mysterious, and the color is like an ant.

" Ant " also means a silkworm that has just hatched. Shen Gonglian in the Qing Dynasty's "Compilation and Supplements to the Theory of Sericulture": "The first born of the (silkworm) child is called the silkworm flower, also known as the ant, also known as the Wu."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " worm " and " righteousness ", the original meaning is ant.
humanum_full_description:
從「虫」，「義」聲，本義為螞蟻。《莊子‧徐無鬼》：「羊肉不慕蟻，蟻慕羊肉，羊肉羶也。」

　　「蟻」可表示浮在酒面的泡沫。三國魏曹植〈節游賦〉：「浮沉蟻於金罍，行觴爵於好仇。」

　　「蟻」還表示玄色，即赤黑，黑中帶紅的顏色。《書‧顧命》：「卿士邦君，麻冕蟻裳，入即位。」孔傳：「蟻，裳名，色玄。」孔穎達疏：「蟻者，蚍蜉蟲也。此蟲色黑，知蟻裳色玄，以色玄如蟻，故以蟻名之。」

　　「蟻」也表示剛孵化的蠶。清沈公練《廣蠶桑說輯補》卷下：「（蠶）子之初生者名蠶花，亦名蟻，又名烏。」

①(螞蟻)昆蟲的一科，種類很多，一般體小，呈黑、褐紅等色，多在地下做窩，羣居生活。簡稱“蟻”：蟻封(蟻穴外隆起的小土堆)。蟻聚。蟻命(喻微賤的生命)。蟻民(舊時人民對官府的自稱，多用於訴狀呈文)。
(Simplified: 蚁)

從「 虫 」，「 義 」聲，本義為螞蟻。《莊子‧徐無鬼》：「羊肉不慕蟻，蟻慕羊肉，羊肉羶也。」 「 蟻 」可表示浮在酒面的泡沫。三國魏曹植〈節游賦〉：「浮沉蟻於金罍，行觴爵於好仇。」 「 蟻 」還表示玄色，即赤黑，黑中帶紅的顏色。《書‧顧命》：「卿士邦君，麻冕蟻裳，入即位。」孔傳：「蟻，裳名，色玄。」孔穎達疏：「蟻者，蚍蜉蟲也。此蟲色黑，知蟻裳色玄，以色玄如蟻，故以蟻名之。」 「 蟻 」也表示剛孵化的蠶。清沈公練《廣蠶桑說輯補》卷下：「（蠶）子之初生者名蠶花，亦名蟻，又名烏。」
From the sound of " worm" and " righteousness", the original meaning is ant. "Zhuangzi·Xu Wugui": "Lamb does not adore ants, but ants admire mutton, and mutton is mutton." " Ant" can mean bubbles floating on the surface of the wine. Wei Cao Zhi of the Three Kingdoms "Jieyou Fu": "Floating and sinking ants are in the golden lizard, and the walking is a good enemy." " Ant" also means black, that is, red and black, with red in black. "Shu‧Gu Ming": "Qing Shibangjun, Ma Mian ant clothes, enter the throne." Kong Chuan: "Ants, clothes names, colors." Kong Yingdashu: "Ants, worms. This insect is black , I know that the clothes of an ant are mysterious, and the color is like an ant. " Ant" also means a silkworm that has just hatched. Shen Gonglian in the Qing Dynasty's "Compilation and Supplements to the Theory of Sericulture": "The first born of the (silkworm) child is called the silkworm flower, also known as the ant, also known as the Wu."

蟻字的基本解释

蟻
yǐ
见“蚁”。

蟻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǐ］
［《廣韻》魚倚切，上紙，疑。］
亦作“螘1”。“蚁1”的繁体字。
(1)蚂蚁。
(2)酒面泡沫。亦借指酒。
(3)玄色。参见“蟻裳”。
(4)比喻卑微；微末；小。
(5)刚孵化的蚕。
(6)姓。汉有蚁逢。见《印薮》。

蟻字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蟻； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1099第03
【唐韻】魚倚切【集韻】魚綺切，?音艤。【說文】作螘，蚍蜉也。【爾雅·釋蟲】蚍蜉，大螘。【疏】螘，通名也，其大者別名蚍蜉，俗呼馬蚍蜉。小者卽名螘，齊人呼螘蛘，《方言》曰蚍蜉，齊魯之閒謂之蚼蟓，西南梁益之閒謂之元蚼，燕謂之蛾蛘。其場謂之坻，或謂之垤是也。其大而赤色斑駁者名蠪，一名朾螘，有翅而飛名?，卽飛螘也。【古今注】河內人?河而見人馬數千萬，皆如黍米，遊動往來，以火燒之，人皆是蚊蚋，馬皆是大蟻，故名蟻曰元駒。【續博物志】白蟻聞竹雞之聲化爲水。　又蟻裳。【書·顧命】麻冕蟻裳。【傳】蟻，裳名，色元。　又蟻丘，山名。【莊子·則陽篇】孔子之楚，舍于蟻丘之漿。　又白蟻，馬名。【博物志】周穆王八駿，三曰白蟻。　又浮蟻，醪汁滓酒也。【張衡·南都賦】浮蟻若萍。　又【唐韻古音】魚我切。義同。　【爾雅】本作螘。【禮記】通作蛾。詳蛾字註。

蟻字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蟻字的起名意思

暂无。

ant
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǐ］
["Guangyun" fish leans on the cut, puts on the paper, suspicious. ]
Also known as "ants 1". Traditional Chinese characters for "蚁1".
(1) Ants.
(2) Bubbles on wine noodles. Also refers to wine.
(3) Black. See "ant clothes".
(4) It is a metaphor of humble; mediocre; small.
(5) Silkworms that have just hatched.
(6) Last name. There are ants in the Han Dynasty. See "Insou".
ant
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　 Ant; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1099 Page 03
[Tang Yun] Fish Relying on Cut [Ji Yun] Fish Qi cut,? Sound. [Said the text] As an ant, it is also a mayfly. 【Erya·Release insects】Mayfly, big ant. [Sparse] Ants, the common name is also, the bigger one is called Mayfly, commonly known as Mayfly. The smaller one is called the ant, and the people of Qi call the ant worm. The "Dialect" is called the mayfly. Qilu is called the worm, the southwest Liang Yizhi is called the yuan worm, and the Yan is the moth worm. The field is called Zhidi, or Zhiqi is also. Its big, red-colored mottled person is named Chu, an ant with wings and a name like flying ant, so is the flying ant. [Ancient and modern notes] Hanoi people? The river sees tens of millions of people and horses, all like millet, swimming around, burning them with fire, all people are gnats, and all horses are big ants, so the name ant is Yuanju. [Continued History of Natural History] Termites turn into water when they hear the sound of bamboo chickens.　An ant suit again. 【Book·Gu Ming】Ma Mian ant clothes. [Biography] Ant, clothing name, color element.　An ant hill again, the name of the mountain. [Zhuangzi·Zeyang] The Chu of Confucius, abandoning the pulp of the anthill.　The termite again, the name of the horse. [Natural History] Zhou Mu, Wang Bajun, and thirdly termites.　Floating ants again, glutinous rice wine. 【Zhang Heng·Nandu Fu】The floating ant Ruoping.　[Tang Yun ancient sound] I cut the fish. The same meaning.　【Erya】This is an ant. 【Book of Rites】Through the moth. Detailed note of the word moth.
